document.title: [PS3] Mise a jour PSN du 20/10/2010
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (20/10/2010) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Offres spéciales disponibles jusqu’au 27 octobre Topatoi: The Great Tree Story (prix initial : 5.99€ – maintenant : 2.99€) Topatoi Bundle (contient le jeu complet, les packs Pillar of Skies et Arcade Style) (prix initial : 9.99€ – maintenant : 5.99€) Blue Toad Murder Files : Episodes 4-6 Smash Cars : Virus Run (prix initial : 2.99€ – maintenant : 0.99€) Hyperballoid : Original World Pack (prix initial : 1.99€ – maintenant : 1.59€) Metal Gear Solid : Portable Ops (PSP) (prix initial : 10.99€ – maintenant : 6.59€) Disney’s Tarzan (PSone) (prix initial : 4.99€ – maintenant : 3.99€) miniS HISTORY Egypt Jeux téléchargeables : Essai et Activation (PS3) Costume Quest (essai gratuit, clef d’activation 11.25€) – PEGI 7 Swords and Soldiers (essai gratuit, clef d’activation 7.99€) – PEGI 12 Jeu téléchargeable (PSP) Legends of War: Patton’s Campaign (29.99€) – PEGI 16 Jeux PSone (PS3 et PSP) Pong (4.99€) – PEGI 3 Centipede (4.99€) – PEGI 3 Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) Dead Rising 2 : Skills Pack Soldier (1.99€) – PEGI 18 Split/Second : Deadline Pack (4.99€) – PEGI 7 Front Mission Evolved : Wanzer Weapon Pack (2.99€) – PEGI 16 WWE Smackdown vs Raw 2011 – PEGI 16 – Online Axxess (7.99€) – Fan Axxess (7.99€) Space Invaders Infinity Gene : Bonus Stages Pack 1 (2.99€) – PEGI 3 Zen Pinball : Paranormal Table (1.99€) – PEGI 12 EyePet – PEGI 3 – Wild West Styling Pack (2.99€) – Winter Sports Styling Pack (2.99€) Guitar Hero: Warriors of Rock – PEGI 12 – Linkin Park Track Pack (9.99€) – Contient toutes les pistes énumérées ci-dessous : – ‘Blackout’ (1.99€) – ‘Burning In The Skies’ (1.99€) – ‘The Catalyst’ (1.99€) – ‘The Messenger’ (1.99€) – ‘Waiting For The End’ (1.99€) – ‘Wretches and Kings’ (1.99€) Rock Band – PEGI 12 – Jimmy Eat World Pack 02 (3.99€) – Contient toutes les pistes énumérées ci-dessous : – ‘Bleed American’ (1.49€) – ‘My Best Theory’ (1.49€) – ‘Pain’ (1.49€) – Stone Temple Pilots Pack 01 (7.99€) – Contient toutes les pistes énumérées ci-dessous : – ‘Big Empty’ (1.49€) – ‘Crackerman’ (1.49€) – ‘Creep’ (1.49€) – ‘Dead & Bloated’ (1.49€) – ‘Huckleberry Crumble’ (1.49€) – ‘Trippin’ On A Hole In A Paper Heart’ (1.49€) Rock Band Network – PEGI 12 – ‘A Prophecy’ by Asking Alexandria (1.49€) – ‘In Memory’ by Excruciating Thoughts (0.79€) – ‘Last Train To Awesometown’ by Parry Gripp (0.79€) – ‘Nom Nom Nom Nom Nom Nom Nom’ by Parry Gripp (0.79€) – ‘Sending Signals’ by Evergreen Terrace (0.79€) Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PSP) Valkyria Chronicles 2 – Complete DLC Pack (4.99€) – PEGI 16 Avatars (PS3) Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype – Keto (0.49€) – Vielkopf 3 (0.49€) – Wuchtklinge (0.49€) Thèmes Premium (PS3) TV Superstars – Amber Belle (1.99€) – Disruptive – Autumn Stroll (1.49€) – Lightning Apocalypse (1.49€) Thèmes (PS3) Valkyria Chronicles II Theme (gratuit) TV Superstars – Big Beat Kitchen (gratuit) – DIY Raw (gratuit) – Frockstar (gratuit) – Let’s Get Physical (gratuit) – STAA (gratuit) – Hosts (gratuit) – Set (gratuit) Vidéos (PS3) The Last Guardian TGS Trailer Team Ico Presents: Ico & Shadow Of The Colossus In Hd Red Dead Redemption : Undead Nightmare Official Trailer Red Dead Redemption : Undead Nightmare Debut Trailer Deathspank: Thongs of Virtue Launch Trailer Deathspank: Thongs of Virtue Trailer FIFA 11 Sizzle Trailer FIFA 11 Tv Advert My Aquarium Video Top Gun Trailer Cette semaine, Costume Quest a l’air intéressant, je vous conseille d’aller voir le site officiel .
